main_menu.message: Loan guidance kosam 1 nokkandi. Bank agents kosam 2 nokkandi.

income_check.message: Mee nelavari aadayam entha? Mee salary 10000 kante takkuva unte 1 nokkandi. 10000 nundi 20000 madhyalo unte 2 nokkandi. 20000 kante ekkuva unte 3 nokkandi.

agent_contact.message: Dhanyavadalu, sthanika financial helper mimmalni twaralo sampradistaru.
agent_contact.sms_body: Dhanyavadalu, sthanika financial helper mimmalni twaralo sampradistaru.

result_mini.message: Meeru mini loans ki saripotaru. Avasaramaina documents Aadhar mariyu Bank Passbook. Mee daggarnunna bank shakhanu sampradinchandi. Dhanyavadalu.
result_mini.sms_body: Mini loans ki arhulu. Docs: Aadhar, Bank Passbook. Bank ni kalavandi. Thanks.

result_small.message: Meeru chinna personal loans leda chinna business loans ki arhulu. Avasaramaina documents Aadhar, Bank Statement mariyu Address Proof. Mee daggarnunna bank shakhanu sampradinchandi. Dhanyavadalu.
result_small.sms_body: Small Personal/Business loans ki arhulu. Docs: Aadhar, Bank Stmt, Address Proof. Bank ni kalavandi.

result_regular.message: Meeru flexible repayments tho regular bank loans ki arhulu. Mee daggarnunna bank shakhanu sampradinchandi. Dhanyavadalu.
result_regular.sms_body: Regular bank loans ki arhulu. Mee daggarnunna bank shakhanu sampradinchandi. Thanks.
